nodes.text: Constable Marcel Shradeer led the several steerage overseers that kept order on bard the AA-9 Freighter-Liner Jendirian Valley while it was transporting refugees from the planet Coruscant to the planet Naboo in 22 BBY.

Marcel Shradeer was first mentioned in the "Starship Fact File" department of the 2015 magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 50. The article was written by Tim Veekhoven, who intended Shradeer to be a human male visible in the 2002 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, and labelled as a steerage overseer in the accompanying Star Wars Legends reference book Star Wars: Attack of the Clones: The Visual Dictionary, which was written by David West Reynolds.
